clinical_study.brief_title: Etude Tomos- Apport de la Tomosynthèse Dans le Bilan d'Extension locorégional préthérapeutique d'Une Tumeur du Sein : Recherche de multicentricité Tomos Study- Contribution of Tomosynthesis In Locoregional Pretherapeutic Staging of a Breast Tumor: Multicentricity Search
clinical_study.official_title: Etude Tomos- Apport de la Tomosynthèse Dans le Bilan d'Extension locorégional préthérapeutique d'Une Tumeur du Sein : Recherche de multicentricité

brief_summary.textblock: The main objective of the study is to assess the sensitivity and specificity of Tomosynthesis in detecting the multicentricity of mammary tumor.

detailed_description.textblock:
The secondaries objectives of the study are:
- Sensitivity and specificity in detecting multifocality of breast tumor
- Sensitivity and specificity of Tomosynthesis in the detection of contralateral tumors
- Predetermination of potential targets for ultrasound

primary_outcome.measure: To calculate the sensitivity and specificity of both types of imaging (mammography and Tomosynthesis) with respect to number of tumors multicentric and multifocal identified through MRI.
primary_outcome.description: To calculate the sensitivity and specificity of both types of imaging (mammography and Tomosynthesis) with respect to number of tumors multicentric and multifocal identified through MRI. The other parameters VPN, VPP will also be calculated and discussed.

intervention.description: An exam by tomosynthesis will be realised at the inclusion of the patient in the study.

intervention.intervention_name: Avaluation of a medical device: the tomosynthesis
intervention.description: An exam by tomosynthesis will be realised at the inclusion of the patient in the study

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age> 18 years.
- Patients with a breast tumor, regardless of the stage and size
- Compulsory affiliation to a social security system.
- Obtaining informed consent in writing, signed and dated.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients with cognitive or psychiatric disorders.
- Patient deprived of liberty by a court or administrative.
- Patients with indications against the achievement of MRI, mammography and tomosynthesis
- Pregnant Women

clinical_study.keyword: To assess efficacy of Tomosynthesis by evaluating its sensitivity and specificity in detecting the multicentricity of mammary tumor
